## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a specific issue?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative approaches?

## Use Case

Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be useful.

## Additional Context

Any other information, mockups, or examples that would help explain the feature.

## Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I would be willing to implement this feature
- [ ] I would be willing to test this feature
- [ ] I just want to suggest the idea
